creator: Matthias.Bergk@crossmediasolutions.de
text:
This bug is easily fixed. Consider TIFFImageEncoder, from line 675:
  // YCbCr positioning.
  fields.add(new TIFFField(TIFF_YCBCR_POSITIONING,
     TIFFField.TIFF_SHORT, 1, 
     new int[] {compression == COMP_JPEG_TTN2 ?
     1 : 2}));
Since the type of the TIFF field is TIFF_SHORT, the value must be "char[]"
instead of "int[]". The current code results in an ClassCastException
in TIFFField.getAsChars().

creator: deweese@apache.org
text:
Thanks for reporting this.
It is now fixed in SVN.
